# spacelift_template_version (Resource)

`spacelift_template_version` represents a version of a Spacelift template. Each template can have multiple versions, each with its own state (DRAFT or PUBLISHED) and template body.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `state` (String) State of the template version. Value can be `DRAFT` or `PUBLISHED`.
- `template_id` (String) ID of the template this version belongs to
- `version_number` (String) Version number (e.g., "1.0.0")

### Optional

- `instructions` (String) Instructions for the template version
- `template` (String) Body of the template. Required if `state` is set to `PUBLISHED`.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (Number) Unix timestamp when the template version was created
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `published_at` (Number) Unix timestamp when the template version was published
- `ulid` (String) Unique ULID of the template version
- `updated_at` (Number) Unix timestamp when the template version was last updated
